author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...CARLOTTA STILL EXPECTED TO BECOME A HURRICANE BY TONIGHT OR TOMORROW...
summary:
...CARLOTTA STILL EXPECTED TO BECOME A HURRICANE BY TONIGHT OR TOMORROW...
 As of 8:00 AM MST Thu Aug 1
 the center of Carlotta was located near 17.2, -111.0
 with movement WNW at 12 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 997 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.
